## In-class activity

How much do 100 corn kernels weigh?

```{r eval=TRUE}
kernels <- read.csv("data/corn_kernel_data.csv")
hist(kernels$weight_g,
     breaks = seq(3,6, by = .1), 
     main = "Histogram of 10 corn kernels weight (g)", 
     xlab = "10 kernel weight (g)", 
     ylab = "count")
```
